full_title: Chip Chrome & the Mono-Tones (Deluxe) by The Neighbourhood
name: Chip Chrome & the Mono-Tones (Deluxe)
name_with_artist: Chip Chrome & the Mono-Tones (Deluxe) (artist: The Neighbourhood)

song.title: Stargazing
song.lyrics:
40 ContributorsTranslationsTürkçeStargazing Lyrics[Verse 1]
Take it from the top
If I start, I just can't stop
All the patience that I've got
It's not enough to save me
It's a race against the clock
But we don't wanna watch
Keep running 'til we're lost
You got me thinkin'

[Pre-Chorus]
Pull it out of park, put it in drive
I can feel your heart beatin' with mine
Underneath the stars, lookin' for a sign
Glowin' in the dark 'til the sun shines
Made it pretty far on the first try
Might've set the bar a little too high
Started with a spark now we're on fire
Started with a spark

[Chorus]
Ooh-ooh, baby
You take me on a ride
Gonna drive me crazy
Ooh-ooh, baby
I feel like we've made it pretty far
Now we're stargazing
You might also like[Verse 2]
Push until it pops
Tryna clear my thoughts
Better keep the A/C on for me
Not enough, yeah
Windows start to fog
Clothing coming off
Makin' it too hot
You got me thinkin'

[Pre-Chorus]
Pull it out of park, put it in drive
I can feel your heart beatin' with mine
Underneath the stars, lookin' for a sign
Glowin' in the dark 'til the sun shines
We made it pretty far on the first try
Might've set the bar a little too high, yeah
It started with a spark now we're on fire

[Chorus]
Ooh-ooh, baby
You take me on a ride
Gonna drive me crazy
Ooh-ooh, baby
I feel like we've made it pretty far
Now we're stargazing
[Instrumental Break]

[Outro]
Ooh-ooh, baby
I feel like we've made it pretty far16Embed

song.full_title: Over the Influence by The Neighbourhood
song.title: Over the Influence
song.lyrics:
24 ContributorsTranslationsTürkçeOver the Influence Lyrics[Verse 1]
Everything started with instinct
My heart and my body felt in sync
Figured out what I've been missing right then and there, yeah
Tried to grow up in a hurry
Caught in the sound and the fury
That's when it starts to get blurry, yeah-yeah
Hmm, the doctor wrote me my prescription
Had a taste, I was addicted
Ate the candy that was given to me, bittersweet

[Chorus]
Walked to the beat of my heart
Got me a shot with the stars
Now I can't help wishin' for a little more space
Followed the path that I saw
I'd pay whatever thе cost
Now the only thing I can't afford is a little more

[Verse 2]
Spеnt my whole life with somebody
Wasted a whole lot of money
Anything not to be lonely
Oh-oh, ooh-woah, oh
Mama's an entertainer, daddy's stranger in the orbit
Got a lot of baggage, always feelin' like a tourist
Surfin' though cyberspace, debatin' what's important (Yeah)
You might also like[Chorus]
Walked to the beat of my heart
Got me a shot with the stars
Now the only thing I'm wishin' for is a little more space
Followed the path that I saw
I'd pay whatever the cost
Now the only thing I can't afford is a little more

[Instrumental Outro]3Embed

song.full_title: Here We Go Again by The Neighbourhood
song.title: Here We Go Again
song.lyrics:
20 ContributorsTranslationsTürkçeHere We Go Again Lyrics[Verse 1]
You showed me what I couldn't see
But it's only killed my hopes and dreams
Now we're goin' to repeat history

[Pre-Chorus]
You say you want it to be great again
But it was never that way to begin with

[Chorus]
Called in the troops
Got 'em to shoot
Caught in a loop
Red, white and blue, ooh-ooh

[Verse 2]
Mama told me, "This is just how it is"
I can't hold on anymore
I think I'm losin' my grip (I think I'm losin' my grip)
Even if you go now (Go now)
Your spirit still lives

[Pre-Chorus]
You say you want it to be great again
But it was never that way to begin with
You might also like[Chorus]
Called in the troops
Got 'em to shoot
Caught in a loop
Red, white and blue, ooh-ooh

[Bridge]
Here we go again, here we go again
Here we go again, here we go again (Woah-ooh, ooh-woah, ooh-woah, ooh-woah, oh-oh)
Here we go again, here we go again (Here we go, here we go, here we go again)

[Outro]
You say you want it to be great again (You said you wanted, babe)
But it was never that way (But it was never that way)
Again, yeah3Embed

song.title: The Shining
song.lyrics:
19 ContributorsThe Shining Lyrics[Verse 1]
I've been hidin'
You've been shinin'
Like, diamonds, blindin'
You've been provin'
You're superhuman
I'm still moon-shootin'

[Chorus]
The way that you glow, everybody knows
You've got a heart of gold
And mine is always broken
So I'll just paint it chrome
Yeah, I'll just paint it chrome
So you're not all alone

[Verse 2]
I've been tryin', too hard
Climbin' to get where you are
Oh, wearin' me out, comparin' myself
Drownin' in doubt, while you're up in the stars
Starin' me down but you're so down to Mars

[Chorus]
The way that you glow, everybody knows, yeah
You've got a heart of gold
And mine is always broken
So I'll just paint it chrome
Yeah, I'll just paint it chrome
So you're not all alone
You might also like[Outro]
I just wanna shine with you, baby
I just wanna shine with you, baby13Embed

song.full_title: Lost in Translation by The Neighbourhood
song.title: Lost in Translation
song.lyrics:
22 ContributorsLost in Translation Lyrics[Intro]
I wonder if they see that you don't belong to me
Wish that you would be mine (Mine)
Wish that you would be

[Chorus]
I've been gettin' lost in translation
Trouble keepin' up communication
We were havin' fun, now I can't wait to be done
Feels like I'm the only one that's sick of playin'

Baby, why you gotta keep me hangin'?
It's like an apple of temptation, oh yeah
You let me get a bite, out of sight, out of mind
Until I found a bruise on the other side

(Do it to me, do it to me, do it to me one more time)

Hey, tryin' to light the fire with no flame (No flame)

I wish I didn't need you to explain (Ooh)

(Do it to me, do it to me, do it to me one more time)

song.title: Devil’s Advocate
song.lyrics:
46 ContributorsDevil’s Advocate Lyrics[Intro]
Woah
One, two, three, four
Woah
Haha
Oh na-na, na-na
Na-na, na-na, na

[Verse 1]
I trade the whip out for a bike, uh
Designer for some Nikes
Switch the stripper for a wife
Black tie for a white tee, uh
I've been moving lightspeed, lightspeed, lightspeed, lightspeed
Lightspeed, lightspeed, lightspeed, lightspeed

[Verse 2]
Look, I don't want to try
Keep it cool like iced tea
So if I seem shy
It's 'cause you seem so shiesty
Sellin' what you buy, buy, buy
Just a product of the 90's
If you close your eyes, uh
That's where you'll find me
You might also like[Chorus]
I'm the devil's advocate
You don't know the half of it
Good luck tryna manage it
If a God is a dog, and a man is a fraud, then I'm a lost cause

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, ooh-ooh

[Verse 3]
Twenty-two's on the ride (Ride)
Bring me back a five piece (Five)
Same ticket for the rent, yeah
But I split it with a dime piece, uh
Married to my friends
They don't always like me
I stay together for the kids, uh
I gotta do the right thing

[Chorus]
I'm the devil's advocate
You don't know the half of it
Good luck tryna manage it
If a God is a dog, and a man is a fraud, then I'm a lost cause

[Guitar Solo]
[Outro]
It ain't right for me
Is it right for you?
If you're missing me

song.full_title: Hell or High Water by The Neighbourhood
song.title: Hell or High Water
song.lyrics:
21 ContributorsHell or High Water Lyrics[Chorus]
I went through Hell, to get to high water
And now I'm tryin' not to drown
Each time I fail, it makes me try harder
I'll reach the stars next time around

[Verse]
I tripped and fell, in the wishing well
I hit rock bottom, pennies kept landin' face down
Lost all I wanted, lookin' for will
Desire burnin', well

[Chorus]
I went through Hell, to get to high water
And now I'm tryin' not to drown
Each time I fail, it makes me try harder
I'll reach the stars next time around

[Instrumental Outro]You might also like1Embed

song.title: Tobacco Sunburst
song.lyrics:
30 ContributorsTobacco Sunburst Lyrics[Instrumental Intro]

In a long, long time

Never knew I'd need your help

song.full_title: Middle of Somewhere by The Neighbourhood
